info.name: Search Filter API Tests
info.description: Comprehensive test scenarios for POST /api/search/filter endpoint covering constraint expansion, skill resolution, knowledge base defaults, and utility scoring.

request.description:
## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]` (empty - no skills requested)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **unresolvedSkills:** `[]` (empty)

## Expected matches

- All engineers except those with `not_available` availability
- Only engineers with proficient or expert proficiency levels
- Sorted by `utilityScore` descending
- Each match has `utilityScore` and `matchStrength`
- Default pagination: 20 results starting at offset 0

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| yearsExperience | `BETWEEN` | 6 AND 10 | knowledge_base |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]` (empty - no skills requested)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with **6-10 years experience**
- Seniority mapping:
  - junior: 0-3 years
  - mid: 3-6 years
  - **senior: 6-10 years**
  - staff: 10+ years
  - principal: 15+ years

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| yearsExperience | `BETWEEN` | 0 AND 3 | knowledge_base |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]` (empty - no skills requested)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with **0-3 years experience**
- Entry-level engineers

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Backend"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** Should include ALL descendants of "Backend" category:
  - **Languages:** Node.js, Express, NestJS, Python, Django, FastAPI, Java, Spring Boot, Go, Rust
  - **Databases:** PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, Neo4j, Kafka
  - **Architecture:** API Design, REST API, GraphQL, gRPC, System Design, Microservices, Event-Driven, Distributed Systems
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **unresolvedSkills:** `[]` (Backend should resolve)

## Expected matches

- Engineers with ANY skill that belongs to Backend category
- `matchedSkills` array populated with matching skills
- `matchType` should be `descendant` for inherited skills

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Frontend"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** Should include descendants of "Frontend" category:
  - JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Vue, Angular
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **unresolvedSkills:** `[]` (Frontend should resolve)

## Expected matches

- Engineers with ANY skill that belongs to Frontend category
- `matchedSkills` populated with matching skills
- Smaller expansion set compared to Backend

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Node.js","TypeScript"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `["Node.js", "TypeScript"]` (leaf skills, no expansion)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **unresolvedSkills:** `[]`

## Expected matches

- Engineers must have **BOTH** Node.js AND TypeScript skills
- `matchedSkills` array shows both skills with `matchType: "direct"`
- Higher `skillMatch` utility for engineers proficient in both

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| timezone | `STARTS WITH` | America/ | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers in **American timezones**
- Includes: `America/New_York`, `America/Los_Angeles`, `America/Chicago`, `America/Denver`, etc.
- Excludes: `Europe/*`, `Asia/*`, `Pacific/*`, etc.

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| timezone | `STARTS WITH` | Europe/ | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers in **European timezones**
- Includes: `Europe/London`, `Europe/Paris`, `Europe/Berlin`, `Europe/Warsaw`, etc.
- Excludes: `America/*`, `Asia/*`, `Pacific/*`, etc.

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "limit", "offset"]`
- **Note:** `availability` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified)

## Expected matches

- Only engineers available **immediately**
- Excludes: `two_weeks`, `one_month`, `not_available`
- Maximum availability utility score (1.0) for all matches

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month","not_available"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "limit", "offset"]`
- **Note:** `availability` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified all options)

## Expected matches

- Includes **ALL engineers** regardless of availability
- `not_available` engineers will have availability utility = 0.0
- Can be used for planning/forecasting purposes

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | **0.85** | user |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **Note:** `riskTolerance` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified `low`)

## Expected matches

- Only **high-confidence matches** (>= 85%)
- Stricter filtering than default medium (70%)
- Fewer results but higher confidence

## Risk Tolerance Mapping

| Level | Min Confidence Score |
|-------|---------------------|
| low | 0.85 |
| medium | 0.70 (default) |
| high | 0.50 |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | **0.50** | user |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **Note:** `riskTolerance` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified `high`)

## Expected matches

- Includes **lower-confidence matches** (>= 50%)
- More permissive than default medium (70%)
- More results but potentially less reliable

## Risk Tolerance Mapping

| Level | Min Confidence Score |
|-------|---------------------|
| low | 0.85 |
| medium | 0.70 (default) |
| high | 0.50 |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["expert"]` | user |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **Note:** `minProficiency` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified `expert`)

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with **expert-level proficiency**
- Excludes `proficient` and `learning` levels
- Strictest proficiency filter available

## Proficiency Hierarchy

| Min Level | Includes |
|-----------|----------|
| learning | learning, proficient, expert |
| proficient | proficient, expert (default) |
| expert | expert only |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["learning","proficient","expert"]` | user |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **Note:** `minProficiency` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified `learning`)

## Expected matches

- **All proficiency levels** included
- Most permissive proficiency filter
- Useful for finding candidates who are learning new skills

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| teamFocusBonus | `BOOST` | `[distributed, system_design, monitoring, kafka]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- **All engineers returned** (teamFocus is NOT a hard filter)
- Engineers with scaling-related skills get **ranking BOOST**
- Engineers with more bonus skills rank higher
- Max team focus bonus: 0.5 utility points (5% weight)

## Team Focus Options

| Focus | Bonus Skills |
|-------|-------------|
| greenfield | ambiguity, creativity, ownership, system_design |
| migration | system_design, debugging, attention_detail, documentation |
| maintenance | debugging, root_cause, documentation, code_review |
| **scaling** | distributed, system_design, monitoring, kafka |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| teamFocusBonus | `BOOST` | `[ambiguity, creativity, ownership, system_design]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- **All engineers returned** (teamFocus is NOT a hard filter)
- Engineers with greenfield-related skills get **ranking BOOST**
- Good for new projects with unclear requirements

## Team Focus Options

| Focus | Bonus Skills |
|-------|-------------|
| **greenfield** | ambiguity, creativity, ownership, system_design |
| migration | system_design, debugging, attention_detail, documentation |
| maintenance | debugging, root_cause, documentation, code_review |
| scaling | distributed, system_design, monitoring, kafka |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| minSalary | `>=` | 100000 | user |
| maxSalary | `<=` | 180000 | user |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with salary **between $100k-$180k**
- Engineers closer to minSalary have **HIGHER** salary utility
- Salary utility is inverse: lower salary = better budget fit

## Salary Utility Notes

- Normalization range: $80k (min) to $300k (max)
- Salary weight: 10% of total utility score

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| maxSalary | `<=` | 150000 | user |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with salary **<= $150k**
- Useful for budget-constrained searches
- No minimum salary floor applied

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Node.js"]` | user |
| preferredSkills | `BOOST` | `["TypeScript","PostgreSQL","Docker"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `["Node.js"]` (required) + `["TypeScript","PostgreSQL","Docker"]` (preferred)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- All matches **MUST have Node.js** (hard filter)
- Engineers with preferred skills **rank HIGHER**
- Preferred skills are nice-to-have, not requirements

## Use Case

> "Must know Node.js, bonus if they know TypeScript/Postgres/Docker"

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability"]`
- **Note:** `limit` and `offset` NOT in defaultsApplied (user specified)

## Expected matches

- Returns results **11-20** (second page of 10)
- `totalCount` shows full count before pagination

## Pagination Defaults

| Field | Default | Max |
|-------|---------|-----|
| limit | 20 | 100 |
| offset | 0 | - |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| yearsExperience | `BETWEEN` | 6 AND 10 | knowledge_base |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks"]` | user |
| timezone | `STARTS WITH` | America/ | user |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Backend"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** Full Backend skill tree (Node.js, Express, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, etc.)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with **6-10 years experience**
- Only engineers in **America/* timezones**
- Only engineers with **immediate or two_weeks** availability
- Must have at least one **Backend skill**
- Each match has `utilityScore` and `matchStrength`

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.85 | user |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["expert"]` | user |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| maxSalary | `<=` | 200000 | user |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Full Stack"]` | user |
| teamFocusBonus | `BOOST` | `[distributed, system_design, monitoring, kafka]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** Full Stack = Backend + Frontend skills combined
- **defaultsApplied:** `["availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- **High-confidence matches only** (>= 85%)
- **Expert proficiency only**
- Salary **<= $200k**
- Must have **Full Stack skills** (extensive skill tree)
- Engineers with scaling skills **rank higher**

> **Note:** Very strict filters - may return fewer results

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| requiredSkills | `IN` | `["Node.js","FakeSkill123","NonExistentTech"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `["Node.js"]` (only valid skill expanded)
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`
- **unresolvedSkills:** `["FakeSkill123", "NonExistentTech"]`

## Expected behavior

- API should **NOT fail**
- Only valid skills are used for filtering
- `unresolvedSkills` array reports skills not found in database
- Useful for debugging skill name mismatches

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |
| domainPreference | `IN` | `["fintech","healthcare"]` | user |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Engineers with experience in **fintech or healthcare** domains
- Domain preference may be a soft constraint (ranking boost) or hard filter
- Check response to determine actual behavior

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| yearsExperience | `>=` | 10 | knowledge_base |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["proficient","expert"]` | knowledge_base |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "minProficiency", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with **10+ years experience**
- Staff level has **no upper bound** (minYears: 10, maxYears: null)
- Compare to senior (6-10 years bounded range)

## Seniority Experience Mapping

| Level | Min Years | Max Years |
|-------|-----------|----------|
| junior | 0 | 3 |
| mid | 3 | 6 |
| senior | 6 | 10 |
| **staff** | 10 | none |
| principal | 15 | none |

## Expected appliedConstraints

| Field | Operator | Value | Source |
|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| yearsExperience | `>=` | 15 | knowledge_base |
| confidenceScore | `>=` | 0.70 | knowledge_base |
| proficiencyLevel | `IN` | `["expert"]` | user |
| availability | `IN` | `["immediate","two_weeks","one_month"]` | knowledge_base |

## Expected queryMetadata

- **skillsExpanded:** `[]`
- **defaultsApplied:** `["riskTolerance", "availability", "limit", "offset"]`

## Expected matches

- Only engineers with **15+ years experience**
- **Expert proficiency only**
- Principal is highest seniority level

> **Note:** May return very few results due to strict criteria
